title: Alesi Wòwɔa Dɔe - Orbital Temple
heading: Ale Si Wòwɔa Dɔe
intro: Nu etɔ̃ siwo do ƒome kple wo nɔewo siwo wɔa dɔ ɖekae tsɔ ɖoa ŋkɔwo ɖe gbedoxɔa le yamenutome lae le Orbital Temple dɔa me.
paragraph1: Satelait la ƒoa xlã Anyigba le teƒe si kɔkɔ abe kilometa 525 ene, eye wòdzraa ŋkɔawo ɖo ɖe eƒe ŋkuɖodzinu me. Anyigbadzi dɔwɔƒewo ɖoa dze kple satelait la le eƒe mɔzɔzɔ me, eye woɖoa ŋkɔ siwo amewo tsɔ ɖo ɖa to nyatakakadzraɖoƒea dzi.
paragraph2: Ne èɖo ŋkɔ aɖe ɖa la, ewɔa ɖeka kple fli aɖe eye woaɖoe ɖe satelait la le mɔɖeɖe si kplɔe ɖo si li me. Àxɔ email ƒe kpeɖodzi ne wotsɔ wò ŋkɔ da ɖe Orbital Gbedoxɔa me dzidzedzetɔe.
imageAlt: Orbital Gbedoxɔ ƒe Ðoɖo ƒe Nɔnɔmetata
